44.Question: What is the Pascal's principle?
options: a. The pressure applied at any point in an incompressible fluid is transmitted undiminished throughout the fluid.
b. The velocity of a fluid in a pipe increases when the pipe narrows.
c. The volume of a gas is inversely proportional to its pressure at constant temperature.
d. The buoyant force on an object in a fluid is equal to the weight of the fluid displaced by the object.
